about_the_game:
Knight Island is a roguelike deckS builder game based on a tile system. In fact, it's not just a deck builder, but rather a deckS builder. Because each tile forming your island has its own deck. :)


Knight Island features a simple and easily learnable game loop. During the day, the only thing you need to do is to develop your island. You can do this using tile cards. There are 3 main types of tile cards: Attack, Economy, and Energy.

Attack Cards

You can probably guess what Attack cards do right away. They allow you to attack :) But of course, there are many different types of attack cards with various features. Choosing the right cards in the tough moments of battle is up to your skill. Knight Island, already very suitable for beginners with its easy game mechanics, begins to offer you much deeper and complex strategic diversity at this point.

Economy Cards

The purpose of Economy cards is to earn money for your island. This allows you to recruit much stronger units or upgrade your cards to higher levels.

Energy Cards

Energy cards are simply buildings that provide power to attack cards. Having an energy system with higher efficiency on your island allows you to use higher-powered cards more frequently in battles.

Battle!

As described above, when you complete developing your island during the day, it becomes night. And at night... At night, the only thing you need to do is fight.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 compatible graphics card, integrated graphics
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 compatible graphics card, integrated graphics

short_description: Tile-based strategy with the best aspects of roguelike deck builders. On top of that, unique mechanics that allow you to shape your island as you wish. Knight Island is a game that blends these features you'll love in this genre and immerses you in unique battles.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support
